author: p2l1-gtEmulator
body:
#### PR description:

Streamlines the GT interface especially the flip of the charge is necessary to be in line with other subsystems.

See: https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1225 and https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1238
title: PuppiNNTau to Phase2GT interface refactor
